row: variant in the B3GAT1 locus (chr11) within ±150 kb of rs78760579 in the GCST006085 prostate cancer GWAS

columns.name: chromosome
columns.description: Chromosome number of the variant, as in the GWAS summary statistics file.

columns.name: position_bp
columns.description: Base-pair position (hg19/GRCh37) of the variant, as in the GWAS summary statistics file.

columns.name: minus_log10_p
columns.description: -log10 of the GWAS p-value for the association between the variant and prostate cancer risk.

columns.name: r2
columns.description: Local linkage disequilibrium r^2 between the variant and the index SNP rs78760579, computed from the LDlink LDassoc output for the B3GAT1 locus. Missing (NA) when LD information is unavailable for that variant.

columns.name: is_index
columns.description: TRUE if the variant is the index SNP rs78760579, FALSE otherwise.

notes: Use the GCST006085 GWAS summary statistics file exactly as provided in input_data; do not re-download or subset externally.
Restrict the extracted_solution.csv rows to variants on chromosome 11 within ±150 kb of rs78760579 at position 134281332 (hg19/GRCh37).
Use EnsDb.Hsapiens.v75 as the Ensembl annotation database for GRCh37 when constructing the locus object with locuszoomr.
Use the pre-computed LD file B3GAT1_LD_r2_clean.tsv in input_data as the sole source of r^2 values; do not call the LDlink API in the solution.
Use the local recombination map file recomb_hg19_hapMapRelease24CombinedRecombMap.bw in input_data when adding recombination rate to the locus plot.
The extracted_solution.jpg plot should qualitatively match the B3GAT1 LocusZoom-style panel in Figure 2.5B, including the index SNP highlight and the color scale based on r^2.
